module.p:
allt ann am monadh a burn on a moor –
Bha Màiri agus Seumas anns a’ mhonadh an dé. [...] Thàinig iad gu allt agus thòisich Seumas air iasgach. Cha do ghlac Seumas breac ach fhuair Màiri nead anns an fhraoch.
Mary and James were on the moor yesterday. [...] They came to a burn and James started fishing. James didn’t catch a trout but Mary found a nest in the heather. td. 76
